name: Shooter (MepelIDK)
description:
Version 1.2.

Nothin much just a shooter.

Use WASD or  arrow keys to move.

Left click or press space to shoot .

Comment your high score and do give feedback.

 Has a glitch were the enemy will spawn on the player.

The Options Button won't do anything I will Add a function to it soon.

The Quit button is broken will fix it soon.

Will fix it soon. 

I hoped u guys enjoyed the game.

This is made on scratch.mit.edu
